title: Mediabay
description:
Mediabay is:
- Online TV with CatchUP function
- TV guide for all channels
- Opportunity to add favorite channels or movies to the favorites
- Movie and series updates
-TV programs, videos and many others.
! List of channels may differ depending on the region of viewing.
For users in Uzbekistan the app works in TAS-IX, as well as in 3G and 4G.
ATTENTION! MOBILE DATA IS BILLED!
Concerning technical support issues, write us in Telegram t.me/mediabay.
Telegram (http://t.me/mediabay)
Mediabay Support
